https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wz8KAzaxf4ZZ0ULUn8ihilI8Ape.jpg In this remake of Charles Dickens' classic "A Christmas Carol", a cold-hearted superstar singer gets a reality check when she meets three Christmas spirits who would change her miserly ways for the better. A Diva's Christmas Carol
